Label: Storyline
Value: Their were 12 high school students with nothing in common, faced with spending a Saturday detention together in their high school library. At first, they argue and hate each other. However, after being stuck together for several hours they begin to reveal their problems, fears, secrets, and deepest emotions.

Label: Cast
Value: Craig Strong, Marc Cayce, Shacola Thompson, Dalton Hahn, Evan Schaffer
